title: Russia Ukraine: Lavrov warns of return to military confrontation nightmare
content:
1. Russia Ukraine: Lavrov warns of return to military confrontation nightmare  BBC News
  2. Analysis: Would Putin get away with invading Ukraine again?  CNN

  5. Russia to unveil security pact proposals in bid to restrain NATO  Reuters
